member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceCategory.Undefined
member.summary: None or unable to parse.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceCategory.Undetermined
member.summary: The response text could not be identified.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceCategory.Hard
member.summary: Hard bounce: Invalid recipient, no recipient.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceCategory.Soft
member.summary: Soft bounce: soft bounced, DNS failure, MX record not found, mailbox is full, message too large, timeout, delayed, auto-reply, unspecified reason.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceCategory.Admin
member.summary: The message was failed by Momentum's (SparkPost) configured policies or the message is a subscribe request.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceCategory.Block
member.summary: The message was blocked by the receiver (spam).

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.Undefined
member.summary: None or unable to parse.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.Undetermined
member.summary: Undetermined The response text could not be identified. Category: Undetermined.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.InvalidRecipient
member.summary: Invalid Recipient The recipient is invalid. Category: Hard.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.SoftBounce
member.summary: Soft Bounce The message soft bounced. Category: Soft.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.DnsFailure
member.summary: DNS Failure The message bounced due to a DNS failure. Category: Soft.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.MailboxFull
member.summary: Mailbox Full The message bounced due to the remote mailbox being over quota. Category: Soft.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.TooLarge
member.summary: Too Large The message bounced because it was too large for the recipient. Category: Soft.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.Timeout
member.summary: Timeout The message timed out. Category: Soft.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.AdminFailure
member.summary: Admin Failure The message was failed by Momentum's configured policies. Category: Admin.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.GenericBounceNoRecipient
member.summary: Generic Bounce: No RCPT No recipient could be determined for the message. Category: Hard.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.GenericBounce
member.summary: Generic Bounce The message failed for unspecified reasons. Category: Soft.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.MailBlock
member.summary: Mail Block The message was blocked by the receiver. Category: Block.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.SpamBlock
member.summary: Spam Block The message was blocked by the receiver as coming from a known spam source. Category: Block.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.SpamContent
member.summary: Spam Content The message was blocked by the receiver as spam. Category: Block.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.ProhibitedAttachment
member.summary: Prohibited Attachment The message was blocked by the receiver because it contained an attachment. Category: Block.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.RelayingDenied
member.summary: Relaying Denied The message was blocked by the receiver because relaying is not allowed. Category: Block.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.AutoReply
member.summary: Auto-Reply The message is an auto-reply/vacation mail. Category: Soft.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.TransientFailure
member.summary: Transient Failure Message transmission has been temporarily delayed. Category: Soft.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.Subscribe
member.summary: Subscribe The message is a subscribe request. Category: Admin.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.Unsubscribe
member.summary: Unsubscribe The message is an unsubscribe request. Category: Hard.

member.name: F:SparkPost.BounceClass.ChallengeResponse
member.summary: Challenge-Response The message is a challenge-response probe. Category: Soft.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.BounceClasses
member.summary: bounce_classes : Number : Comma-delimited list of bounce classification codes to search. See Bounce Classification Codes at https://support.sparkpost.com/customer/portal/articles/1929896. Example: 1,10,20.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.CampaignIds
member.summary: campaign_ids : ? : (optional, string, `Example Campaign Name`) ... Comma-delimited list of campaign ID's to search (i.e. campaign_id used during creation of a transmission).

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.Events
member.summary: events : List : Comma-delimited list of event types to search. Defaults to all event types. Example: delivery, injection, bounce, delay, policy_rejection, out_of_band, open, click, generation_failure, generation_rejection, spam_complaint, list_unsubscribe, link_unsubscribe.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.FriendlyFroms
member.summary: friendly_froms : ? : (optional, list, `sender@mail.example.com`) ... Comma-delimited list of friendly_froms to search.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.From
member.summary: from : Datetime : Datetime in format of YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM. Example: 2014-07-20T08:00. Default: One hour ago.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.MessageIds
member.summary: message_ids : List : Comma-delimited list of message ID's to search. Example: 0e0d94b7-9085-4e3c-ab30-e3f2cd9c273e.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.Page
member.summary: page : number : The results page number to return. Used with per_page for paging through results. Example: 25. Default: 1.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.PerPage
member.summary: per_page : Number : Number of results to return per page. Must be between 1 and 10,000 (inclusive). Example: 100. Default: 1000.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.Reason
member.summary: reason : String :Bounce/failure/rejection reason that will be matched using a wildcard(e.g., %reason%). Example: bounce.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.Recipients
member.summary: recipients : List : Comma-delimited list of recipients to search. Example: recipient @example.com.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.Subaccounts
member.summary: subaccounts : List : Comma-delimited list of subaccount ID's to search. Example: 101.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.TemplateIds
member.summary: template_ids : List : Comma-delimited list of template ID's to search. Example: templ-1234.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.Timezone
member.summary: timezone : String : Standard timezone identification string. Example: America/New_York. Default: UTC.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.To
member.summary: to : Datetime : Datetime in format of YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM. Example: 2014-07-20T09:00. Default: now.

member.name: P:SparkPost.MessageEventsQuery.TransmissionIds
member.summary: transmission_ids : List : Comma-delimited list of transmission ID's to search (i.e. id generated during creation of a transmission). Example: 65832150921904138.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.Undefined
member.summary: Undefined/unknown or unable to parse.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.Delivery
member.summary: delivery Delivery. Remote MTA acknowledged receipt of a message.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.Injection
member.summary: injection Injection. Message is received by or injected into SparkPost.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.Bounce
member.summary: bounce Bounce. Remote MTA has permanently rejected a message.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.Delay
member.summary: delay Delay. Remote MTA has temporarily rejected a message.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.PolicyRejection
member.summary: policy_rejection Policy Rejection. Due to policy, SparkPost rejected a message or failed to generate a message.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.OutOfBand
member.summary: out_of_band Out of Band. Remote MTA initially reported acceptance of a message, but it has since asynchronously reported that the message was not delivered.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.Open
member.summary: open Open. Recipient opened a message in a mail client, thus rendering a tracking pixel.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.Click
member.summary: click Click. Recipient clicked a tracked link in a message, thus prompting a redirect through the SparkPost click-tracking server to the link's destination.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.GenerationFailure
member.summary: generation_failure Generation Failure. Message generation failed for an intended recipient.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.GenerationRejection
member.summary: generation_rejection Generation Rejection. SparkPost rejected message generation due to policy.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.SpamComplaint
member.summary: spam_complaint Spam Complaint. Message was classified as spam by the recipient.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.ListUnsubscribe
member.summary: list_unsubscribe List Unsubscribe. User clicked the 'unsubscribe' button on an email client.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.LinkUnsubscribe
member.summary: link_unsubscribe Link Unsubscribe. User clicked a hyperlink in a received email.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.SmsStatus
member.summary: sms_status SMS Status. SMPP/SMS message produced a status log output.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.RelayInjection
member.summary: relay_injection Relay Injection. Relayed message is received by or injected into SparkPost.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.RelayRejection
member.summary: relay_rejection Relay Rejection. SparkPost rejected a relayed message or failed to generate a relayed message.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.RelayDelivery
member.summary: relay_delivery Relay Delivery. Remote HTTP Endpoint acknowledged receipt of a relayed message.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.RelayTempfail
member.summary: relay_tempfail Relay Temporary Failure. Remote HTTP Endpoint has failed to accept a relayed message.

member.name: F:SparkPost.MessageEventType.RelayPermfail
member.summary: relay_permfail Relay Permanent Failure. Relayed message has reached the maximum retry threshold and will be removed from the system.

member.summary: Creates an email template.
member.param: The properties of the template to create.

member.name: M:SparkPost.ITemplates.Retrieve(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Retrieves an email template.
member.param: The id of the template to retrieve.
If true, returns the most recent draft template. If false, returns the most recent published template. If not provided, returns the most recent template version regardless of draft or published.
